actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Committee on Post Office and Civil Service discharged in House.
Referred to Senate Committee on Judiciary.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on the Judiciary (without written rept.).
Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating October 12 through October 19, 1980, as "Italian-American Heritage Week".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate October 12 through October 19, 1980, as "Italian-American Heritage Week."

titles.title: A joint resolution to authorize and request the President to issue a proclamation designating October 12 through October 19, 1980, as "Italian-American Heritage Week".
